content: The Old Ginseng Guai is an optional miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. This Yaoguai Chief hides underground disguised as an innocent plant, and must be plucked in the Valley of Ecstasy.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Old_Ginseng_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Old Ginseng Guai'.
The content is as follows:
The Old Ginseng Guai is an optional miniboss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 3 of Black Myth Wukong. This Yaoguai Chief hides underground disguised as an innocent plant, and must be plucked in the Valley of Ecstasy.
